Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Predicament and the Clam Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz's staged drowning and the subsequent confrontation about an unpaid debt, highlighting the opportunistic nature of the 'rescuer'.

sub_scenes.title: The Drowning and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz in a seemingly dangerous situation and his dramatic rescue, setting the stage for the revelation of ulterior motives.

sub_scenes.title: The Debt Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Immediately following the 'rescue', this sub-scene reveals the rescuer's true intention: to collect an old debt from King Guz, exposing the staged nature of the rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: The Debt of Clams and the 'Rescue'

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto's Clumsiness and the Dinosaur Trade
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around Alley Oop's dinosaur, Bronto, and his clumsiness, leading to the idea of trading him in for a newer model, and the eventual purchase of a new dinosaur with unexpected consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Trouble
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Bronto's recurring issue of bumping into trees, causing frustration for Alley Oop and introducing a grumpy tree-dwelling dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto's Bumpy Ride and the Tree Dweller

sub_scenes.title: Diagnosis and Trade-in Idea
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop discusses Bronto's clumsiness with another caveman, who suggests it's due to old age and high mileage, leading to the idea of trading Bronto in.

sub_scenes.title: Visiting Honest Zog's Dealership
sub_scenes.description: The scene moves to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership, where the caveman explores options for a new dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: The Little Baby with Zip and Power
Initial Impression of the New Dinosaur

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Bronto and New Dinosaur Adjustments
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the emotional farewell to Bronto, the initial instructions for the new dinosaur, and the buyer's immediate regret.

narrative_arcs.title: Closing the Deal with a Sales Pitch
Voice from the Past: Dinny's Roar

Major_Arcs.title: Alley and Coola's Romantic Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on the romantic relationship between Alley and Coola, their argument over Alley's presumptuousness, and the ensuing break-up.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, but she rejects him, initiating the conflict and revealing underlying tensions in their relationship.

sub_scenes.title: The Break-up
sub_scenes.description: Coola confronts Alley about his behavior, leading to a definitive break-up symbolized by a falling rock.

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Frustrations and Misogynistic Musings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a humorous interlude focusing on general frustrations related to fishing and stereotypical, misogynistic complaints about women, seemingly inspired by Alley's recent romantic troubles.

sub_scenes.title: General Complaints about Women
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express stereotypical and bewildered views on women's nature and behavior, showcasing a prejudiced perspective.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Annoyances
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen complain about noises and disruptions during fishing, highlighting typical fishing-related frustrations.

sub_scenes.title: Riverbank Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The fishing complaints culminate in a direct confrontation where a noisy caveman is reprimanded for scaring away the fish, linking back to the earlier misogynistic comments.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Apology by the River

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry for Oola and its Violent Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a romantic rivalry for Oola's affection, marked by jealousy, violence, misunderstanding, and eventual resolution with a different romantic pairing.

sub_scenes.title: Rumors and Verification of Rivalry
sub_scenes.description: Rumors of a romantic rival for Oola surface, leading to disbelief and a reluctant decision to verify the situation.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Jealousy and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy erupts into violence as a caveman attacks a perceived rival, but the woman's reaction reveals a misunderstanding about her affections.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Error and Rejected Suitor

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Romantic Advice and Strategy
sub_scenes.description: The rejected caveman seeks advice on romance, learning about 'French' methods and formulating a strategy of imitation.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Advice on Romance and Rivalry

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gestures and Crocodile Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures and escalating rivalry are interrupted by a humorous crocodile incident orchestrated by Koko.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and Impending Danger

sub_scenes.title: Eavesdropping, Confrontation, and Comic Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Eavesdropping leads to another confrontation based on romantic jealousy, culminating in a comical misunderstanding about cannibalism and a new romantic pairing.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusations and Romantic Rebranding
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity lead to physical punishment and then a sudden shift to romantic rebranding, inspired by 'French' romance.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Infidelity and Physical Retribution
Plea for Forgiveness and Romantic Rebrand

Major_Arcs.title: The Chaos of the New Twist Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the introduction of a dangerous new dance craze, 'The Twist', and its chaotic social and physical consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Initial Reactions to 'The Twist'
sub_scenes.description: The 'NEW TWIST' dance is introduced, immediately showing its dangerous nature and sparking initial resistance and humorous commentary.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dangerous New Twist Dance and Initial Resistance
Social Pressure and Demands to Learn the New Twist

sub_scenes.title: A Disastrous Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: A dance lesson for 'The Twitch' (likely the same as 'The Twist') goes hilariously wrong, culminating in a comedic name reveal.

narrative_arcs.title: A Disastrous First Dance Lesson and Name Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Unforeseen and Widespread Consequences of 'The Twitch'
sub_scenes.description: The disastrous consequences of 'The Twitch' are revealed to be widespread and severe, leading to fear, humiliation, and even hospitalization.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on 'The Twitch' and its Unforeseen Consequences

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishaps to Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows characters using a time machine to visit 16th-century Spain, but experiencing unexpected and humorous displacements and encounters.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Initial Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: The arc begins with the planning of time travel to 16th-century Spain and the initial activation of the time machine.

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Kiss and Journey to the Future
sub_scenes.description: A romantic moment in the past is interrupted by time travel, unexpectedly transporting characters to the 20th century.

narrative_arcs.title: Reluctant Kiss and Time Machine Activation
Unexpected Time Travel to the Future
Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Return to Spain

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Bullfight in Spain
sub_scenes.description: Arrival in Spain leads to confusion, a serenade misunderstanding, a fight, and an unexpected bullfight performance by a time traveler.

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Return and Romantic Troubles (Again)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with Oop's return from his Spanish adventure and his immediate entanglement in romantic misunderstandings and accusations.

sub_scenes.title: Anticipated Return and Immediate Conflict
sub_scenes.description: Oop's return is eagerly awaited for information, but he immediately faces romantic tension and accusations upon arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation for Oop's Return and Information
The Promised Kiss and Romantic Interlude
Questioning Oop's Learnings and Rejection of Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and the Hardships of Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirically explores the concept of temporary kingship, revealing the unexpected difficulties and disrespect associated with even a day of rule.

sub_scenes.title: Inauguration and Initial Challenge
sub_scenes.description: The arc begins with the humorous inauguration of a 'King for a Day' and an immediate challenge to the perceived ease of the role.

narrative_arcs.title: The Inauguration of a Temporary King
Debate on the Ease of Kingship
King's Challenge and Temporary Replacement Plan
The Crowning of the New Temporary King

sub_scenes.title: Rejection and Realization
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king's rule is immediately rejected by the populace, leading to violence and his realization that kingship is not easy.

narrative_arcs.title: Proclamation of a Temporary King and His Expectations
Rejection and Attack on the Temporary King
Seeking Refuge and Realization of Hardships
Return of the Original King and Enjoyment of Power

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and Oompa's Unpleasant Interactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the consistently negative and abusive interactions between Guz and Oompa, highlighting a dynamic of dominance and forced servitude.

sub_scenes.title: Disapproval and Forced Bathing
sub_scenes.description: Oompa disapproves of Guz's leisurely lifestyle, leading to physical confrontation and forcing Guz to take an unwanted bath.

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding and Apology (but still negative)
sub_scenes.description: A misunderstanding leads to violence, followed by an apology, but still underscores the unpleasant dynamic between Guz and Oompa.

Major_Arcs.title: Moovian Palace Governance and Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the chaotic governance within 'Moovian Palace', showcasing disputes, violence, and questionable wisdom.

sub_scenes.title: Chaos and Dispute Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The palace is shown in chaos with accusations and fighting, leading to the king seeking 'wise' counsel to resolve a clam dispute.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of the Clam Dispute and Seeking Wisdom
The Wise Man's Solution: Confiscation and Peace

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Violence and Royal Dining
sub_scenes.description: Violence is commonplace, and even royal dining is marked by strange demands and outbursts, highlighting the erratic nature of rule.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Ongoing Beating
The Ulcer Inquiry and Bizarre Demand

Major_Arcs.title: Leadership Transition in Moovian Palace
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc describes a change in leadership in Moovian Palace, from one ruler stepping down to the search for and offer of kingship to a new individual.

sub_scenes.title: Resignation and Search for a New Ruler
sub_scenes.description: A ruler expresses relief at relinquishing power, prompting a search for a new leader in Moovian Palace.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring for Rule and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling and the Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a humorous and ironic scenario involving fortune telling, a romantic prophecy, and a violent barber forcibly recruiting customers.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Prophecy
sub_scenes.description: A fortune teller predicts a romantic encounter, seemingly setting up a romantic storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Barber Recruitment
sub_scenes.description: The 'romantic' prophecy takes a violent turn as the 'handsome stranger' abducts a man, revealing a darker and humorous purpose.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Unexpected Visitor
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a return to time travel, but with a malfunction leading to the unexpected arrival of a Roman centurion.

sub_scenes.title: Setting up Time Travel and Materialization
sub_scenes.description: A man sets up his time machine, intending to bring someone from the past to the present.
